header.header1: Explore your finances today with AsylMind.

hero.title: Manage. Save. Achieve.
hero.subtitle: Track, learn, set goals, and manage your money to gain financial clarity and confidence in your decisions. AsylMind is your path to a mature and free relationship with money.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: AsylMind helps you understand where your money goes, how to start saving, and makes finances simple and understandable.

cards.question: Don't understand where your money goes?
cards.answer: AsylMind will show everything clearly and simply. You will immediately see what you spend the most on and where you can save so that your money starts working for you.

cards.question: Finding it hard to start saving?
cards.answer: We'll help you take the first step. AsylMind will tell you how much you can put aside now and show you how to gradually increase your savings.

cards.question: Are you afraid of complex financial terms?
cards.answer: We will explain it in simple and understandable language. We will help you understand finances without unnecessary complexity and make learning easy and fun.

growth.title: Financial growth
growth.subtitle: Short lessons & guides, personal progress and habits - everything to help you achieve your goals.

cards.title: Mini-lessons
cards.text: Short articles on financial basics that help you understand where your money goes and how to start saving. Lessons are where your path to financial awareness begins.

cards.title: Financial base
cards.text: Financial progress in AsylMind is not just about numbers. Move from beginner to financially free by following simple steps: budget, take mini-lessons, achieve goals

cards.title: Habit
cards.text: Streaksüî• system: AsylMind will help you quickly turn your daily activity into a habit and achieve results.

privacy.title: 1. Introduction
privacy.text: Welcome to AsylMind ‚Äî an intelligent financial application! We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This document explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information. Please read carefully.

privacy.title: 2. What data we collect
privacy.text: We process the following categories of information:

list.Personal data: Name, email address, phone number, and other contact details you provide during registration.
list.Technical data: IP address, device and browser type, operating system, usage information (e.g., visit time, pages viewed, actions in the app).
list.Financial information: Data about your income, expenses, goals, investments, and other financial activities you enter in the app.

privacy.title: 3. How we use your information
privacy.text: Your data is used for the following purposes:

list.Service provision: Budget creation, savings recommendations, and other app functions.
list.Product improvement: User behavior analysis, interface and feature optimization.
list.Communication with you: Notifications about updates, support, helpful tips, and offers (with your consent).

privacy.subtext: We do not sell your data.

privacy.title: 4. Data sharing with third parties
privacy.text: We do not share your personal data with third parties, except in the following cases:

list.Verified services: Trusted hosting or analytics partners bound by confidentiality agreements.
list.Legal requirements: When required by law or to protect rights, security, and interests.

privacy.title: 5. Data security
privacy.text: We apply standard information protection methods: encryption, access restrictions, secure storage. However, no system guarantees 100% security.

privacy.title: 6. Your rights

list.Deletion: Request deletion of your account and all data.

privacy.subtext: To exercise your rights, please contact us using the provided contacts.

privacy.title: 7. Policy updates
privacy.text: We may make changes to this policy. Updates will be published in the app or on the website. We recommend checking the terms regularly.
